ai-vv1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-vv1:2.1_0: “You have a golden coin, made of gold,
ai-vv1:2.2_0: I went to a little village.
ai-vv1:2.3_0: good in the jungle thicket, it is good in the middle.
ai-vv1:2.4_0: lightning up the peak of light,
ai-vv1:4.1_0: I ask you, Queen, the mightycle of the great power,
ai-vv1:4.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv1:5.3_0: asked a question, and he answered the questions.
ai-vv1:5.4_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv1:6.4_0: not just as he gave a gift.
ai-vv1:8.1_0: I am a mendicant with great power,
ai-vv1:8.2_0: A human beings lived for merit;
ai-vv1:8.3_0: and that by the power of this I developed
ai-vv1:8.4_0: and my complexion was like me.”
